EmailTemplate.name: PS Survey Sample 1 - UK
EmailTemplate.subject: Intapp Professional Services Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Following the completion of the Intapp [Product] project, please would you provide us with feedback on the delivery of the project - myself as the project manager, [Name] as the consultant, and [Name] as the engineer.
Our approach to delivery is continuously reviewed and improved and customer feedback is vital to this. We strive for a 10 out of 10 (of course) and where you feel we have fallen short, we would like to know. And also what you feel went well. Where you feel we scored 7 or less, one of our directors will reach out to discuss your feedback further.
Click here to take the survey
Many thanks in advance, {!pse__Milestone__c.MilestoneProjectPMFullName__c} {!pse__Milestone__c.MilestoneProjectPMTitle__c} Intapp,Inc. http://www.intapp.com
